title: Gattaca
creator_credit: Janek Sirrs, Jan Roelfs, Andrew Niccol, Stacey Sher, Michael Shamberg, Colleen Atwood, Danny DeVito, Sony Pictures, Columbia Pictures and Jersey Films
brief_description: In a future society in the era of indefinite eugenics, humans are set on a life course depending on their DNA. Young Vincent Freeman is born with a condition that would prevent him from space travel, yet is determined to infiltrate the GATTACA space program.

constellations_other.name: Dream A Little Crazy: The next stage of human evolution
constellations_other.description: Collaborators Lucy McRae and Rachel Wingfield created a ‘biological bakery’ for Architecture In Helsinki’s "Dream A Little Crazy". Manufacturing a series of mass-produced band members the clip explores speculative science and the future of the human body’s evolution.
